## Metadata

Tags that we can use for the Parsons Paper Register file on the Digital Commonwealth site.

-   File name

-   File path

-   File datastream

-   Item fulltext with server path (for indexing)

-   Local accession

-   Other local identifier

-   Local call number

-   Local barcode

-   ISBN

-   SICI (Serial Item and Contribution Identifier)

-   Primary title

-   Type of resource

-   BASIC genre/form

-   Place of publication

-   Publisher

-   Date Type

-   Date

-   Volume

-   Issue number

-   Edition

-   Edition number

-   Language

-   Physical description

-   Digital origin

-   Summary/Abstract

-   Table of contents

-   Notes (there are different types of note variables; ie. acquisition notes, biographical/historical notes, publication notes, etc.)

-   Host collection

-   Subcollection

-   Constituent

-   Series

-   Subseries

-   Physical location (library)

-   Library department

-   Shelf locator

-   Rights

-   License

-   Description standard

-   Repository Set Name

-   Internet Archive identifier

-   Destination site information

-   Harvesting status

-   Subject (different variables for this, ie. subject keyword, subject name, etc.)
